sfField.formula: IF( rstk__soline_sohdr__r.rstk__sohdr_custcurrency__c , rstk__soline_altprice1__c , IF( ISNULL( rstk__soline_sohdr__r.rstk__sohdr_currexchrate__c ) || rstk__soline_sohdr__r.rstk__sohdr_currexchrate__c = 0 , rstk__soline_altprice1__c , rstk__soline_altprice1__c * rstk__soline_sohdr__r.rstk__sohdr_currexchrate__c))

IF( rstk__soline_sohdr__r.rstk__sohdr_custcurrency__c , rstk__soline_altprice2__c , IF( ISNULL( rstk__soline_sohdr__r.rstk__sohdr_currexchrate__c ) || rstk__soline_sohdr__r.rstk__sohdr_currexchrate__c = 0 , rstk__soline_altprice2__c , rstk__soline_altprice2__c * rstk__soline_sohdr__r.rstk__sohdr_currexchrate__c))

IF( rstk__soline_status__c = 1, 'Planned', IF( rstk__soline_status__c = 2, 'Firmed', IF( rstk__soline_status__c = 3, 'Partial Allocated', IF( rstk__soline_status__c = 4, 'Allocated', IF( rstk__soline_status__c = 5, 'Partial Issued', IF( rstk__soline_status__c = 6, 'Issued', IF( rstk__soline_status__c = 7, 'Partial Packaged', IF( rstk__soline_status__c = 8, 'Packaged', IF( rstk__soline_status__c = 9, 'Partial Ship', IF( rstk__soline_status__c = 10, 'Shipped', ''))))))))))

sfField.t: Prevent Packaging of a Partial Line

Prevent Pick if Line Is Not Allocated
